price: Kuma a rãnar da Muke tafiyar da duwãtsu, kuma ka ga ƙasa bayyane, kuma Mu tãra su har ba Mu bar kõwa ba daga gare su.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نُسَيِّرُ ٱلۡجِبَالَ وَتَرَى ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَارِزَةٗ وَحَشَرۡنَٰهُمۡ فَلَمۡ نُغَادِرۡ مِنۡهُمۡ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma nusayyiru al-jibāla watarā al-arḍa bārizatan waḥasharnāhum falam nughādir min'hum aḥadan
